Name: Community Education and Lifelong Learning (Normal Entry)
Description: Focuses on educational programs for community development and lifelong learning.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' Level passes including English and any 2 'A' passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Community Education and Lifelong Learning (Special Entry)
Description: Focuses on educational programs for community development and lifelong learning.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: A Diploma in Adult Education\Lifelong learning or its equivalent is required. An entrance test will be provided to adults who have at least 5 'O' Levels and a minimum of one year of Experience working with adults in various fields of adult Lifelong learning.

Name: Criminology and Society
Description: Examines the study of crime, criminal behavior, and their societal implications.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' level passes, including English and any 2 'A' level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Urbanisation and Social Amenities Development
Description: Focuses on the processes of urbanization and the development of social amenities.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' level passes, including English and Mathematics at grade C or better plus any 2 'A' level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Smart Technology Applications and Community Development
Description: Explores the application of smart technologies for community development.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' level passes, including English and Mathematics with grade B or better plus any 2 'A' level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Social Innovation and Community Development
Description: Focuses on developing innovative solutions for social challenges and community development.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' level passes, including English with grade B or better plus any 2 'A' level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Industrial Sociology
Description: Examines the social structures and relationships within industrial settings.
Faculty: Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences
Requirements: 5 'O' level passes, including English Language with a B or better and any 2 'A' level passes in Arts subjects.

Name: Biotechnology
Description: Focuses on the application of biological systems and organisms to develop new products and technologies.
Requirements: 2 'A' Level passes in Biology and Chemistry and any one of the following subjects: Mathematics, Additional Mathematics, Mechanical Mathematics, Physics, Food Science, Crop Science, Agricultural Engineering, Food Technology and Design and 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Applied Chemistry
Description: Focuses on the practical application of chemical principles in various industries.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Chemistry and any one of the following subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Pure Mathematics, Mechanical Mathematics, Additional Mathematics, Statistics. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Applied Mathematics
Description: Focuses on the application of mathematical methods to solve problems in science, engineering, and other fields.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics, Additional Mathematics and any one of the following subjects: Physics, Statistics, Geography, Chemistry, Biology and 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Applied Physics
Description: Focuses on the practical application of physics principles to technology and real-world problems.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Physics and any one of the following subjects: Mathematics, Pure Mathematics, Mechanical Mathematics, Additional Mathematics. 5 'O' level passes including English language and Mathematics.

Name: Computer Science
Description: Focuses on the theoretical foundations of information and computation and their practical application.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics and any one of the following subjects: Physics, Computer Science, Software Engineering. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Informatics
Description: Focuses on the study of information processing and the design of information systems.
Requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Computer Science, Software Engineering or Physics and any Science or Commercial subject. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Earth Sciences
Description: Focuses on the study of the Earth's physical structure, history, and processes.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Physics and any one of following: Mathematics Mechanical Mathematics, Pure Mathematics, Mechanical Mathematics, Additional Mathematics 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Operations Research and Statistics
Description: Focuses on the application of advanced analytical methods to help make better decisions and solve complex problems.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Statistics or Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics and any one of the following subjects from Science or Social Science subjects (Geography, Management or Economics)and 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Business Analytics
Description: Focuses on using data and statistical methods to gain insights and make informed business decisions.
Requirements: 'A' Level pass in Statistics or Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics, or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics and any one of the following; subjects from Science or Social Science subjects (Geography, Management or Economics) and 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Radiography (August Intake Only)
Description: Focuses on medical imaging techniques for diagnosis and treatment.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 'A' Level pass in Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics plus Physics and one of the following; Biology or Chemistry. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: A Diploma in Radiography or equivalent qualification with at least 2 years clinical work experience. The applicant must be employed and practising Radiography at the time of applying for entry to the programme.

Name: Sports Science and Coaching
Description: Focuses on the scientific study of sport and exercise, and the principles of coaching.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in any of the following subjects: Sports Science and Technology, Physical Education, Sport and Mass Display, Sport Management, Biology, Food Science, Food Technology and Design. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Candidates who have successfully completed a Diploma in Sports Science or Physical Education or its recognised equivalent may apply.

Name: Agricultural Engineering
Description: Focuses on the design, development, and application of engineering principles to agricultural systems.
Faculty: Faculty of Agricultural Sciences and Technology
Requirements: Normal Entry: 3 'A' Level passes in Pure/Additional/Mechanical Mathematics and Physics and any one of the following subjects; Biology, Agriculture, Chemistry, Crop Science, Animal Science, Computer Science or any other approved equivalent Science subject at 'A' level. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: National Diploma in Agriculture, Agricultural Engineering, Civil Engineering, Surveying, Mechanical, or equivalent plus 2 years relevant working experience. Or Higher National Diploma in Agriculture, Agricultural Engineering, Civil Engineering, Surveying, Mechanical, or equivalent plus one-year relevant working experience. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. At least 25 years of age at the time of application plus relevant experience in the field of Agriculture or Engineering. The applicant may be subjected to an interview.

Name: Agribusiness, Economics and Management
Description: Focuses on the business, economic, and management aspects of the agricultural industry.
Faculty: Faculty of Agricultural Sciences and Technology
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in 2 Science and/or Commercial subjects or National Diploma. 5 'O' level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: At least a National Diploma in the field of Agriculture from an accredited institution. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' level passes including English Language and Mathematics. 25 years of age at the time of application plus 5-years relevant working experience. The applicant may be subjected to an interview.

Name: Sustainable Food Production
Description: Focuses on methods and systems for producing food in an environmentally and socially responsible manner.
Faculty: Faculty of Agricultural Sciences and Technology
Requirements: Normal Entry: At least one 'A' Level pass in either Food Science, Biology, Agriculture, Crop Science, Animal Science or Geography, and any other related Science or Commercial Subjects at 'A' Level. Special Entry: National Diploma in any Agricultural field. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' passes including English Language and Mathematics. 25 years of age at the time of application plus 5-years relevant experience in the field of Agriculture. The applicant may be subjected to an interview.

Name: Agricultural Genetics and Cell Technology
Description: Focuses on the genetic improvement of agricultural crops and livestock, and the application of cell technology.
Faculty: Faculty of Agricultural Sciences and Technology
Requirements: Normal Entry: 'A' level pass in Biology and at least one of the following subjects, Geography, Chemistry, Crop Science, Animal Science or any other science subject at 'A' Level. 5 'O' level subjects including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: National Diploma in any Agricultural field. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' level passes including English Language and Mathematics. 25 years of age at the time of application plus 5-years relevant experience in the field of Agriculture. The applicant may be subjected to an interview.

Name: Agricultural Information Technology
Description: Focuses on the application of information technology in agricultural practices and management.
Faculty: Faculty of Agricultural Sciences and Technology
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Computer Science or Agriculture and any other relevant Science or Commercial subject or Relevant National Certificate. Special Entry: A Diploma in Agriculture or Information Technology or any related field from a recognized institution. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' level passes including English Language and Mathematics. The applicant should be at least 25 years old and should have at least 5-years relevant industrial experience.

Name: Architectural Studies Honours Degree
Description: Focuses on the art and science of designing buildings and other physical structures.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 'A' Level pass in Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Additional Mathematics plus any of the following subjects: Physics, Art, Geometrical & Mechanical Drawing, Building Technology, Design & Technology. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: A National Diploma in Architecture or Architectural Technology. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Mature Entry: 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Applicants must be above 25 years of age; be at least 5 years after their last qualification and are required to submit a CV and references and Portfolio. Applicants may be subjected to an interview.

Name: Quantity Surveying
Description: Focuses on the financial and contractual management of construction projects.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in either Pure Mathematics or Further Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Physics and any one of the following subjects; Geometrical & Mechanical Drawing, Building Technology, Design & Technology, Technical Graphics, and Accounting. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Applicants must have a National Diploma in Quantity Surveying with 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Construction Management
Description: Focuses on the planning, coordination, and control of construction projects.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in Mathematics or Further Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics or Physics and any one of the following subjects; Statistics, Geography, Geometrical & Mechanical Drawing, Building Technology, Design & Technology, Technical Graphics, Accounting, Business Studies. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Applicants must have a National Diploma in Architectural Technology, Civil Engineering, Civil and Construction Engineering, Quantity Surveying, Town Planning, Surveying and Geomatics or Construction Technology. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Property Development and Estate Management
Description: Focuses on the development, valuation, and management of real estate properties.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 2 'A' Level passes in Geography, Mathematics or Mechanical Mathematics or Pure Mathematics, Additional Mathematics, Accounting, Economics, Business Studies, Management of Business. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: A National Diploma in Town Planning, Valuation and Estate Management, Quantity Surveying, Architectural Technology, Civil Engineering Finance and Business Studies. The Real Estate Institute of Zimbabwe certification or its equivalence. Additional qualifications and work experience will be an added advantage. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics.

Name: Chemical Engineering
Description: Applies principles of chemistry, physics, and biology to design and operate chemical processes.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 3 'A' level passes in Mechanical Mathematics/Pure Mathematics/Additional Mathematics and Chemistry plus Physics or Biology. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Relevant National Diploma plus 2 years' experience. Relevant Higher National Diploma plus 1-year experience.

Name: Civil and Water Engineering
Description: Focuses on the design, construction, and maintenance of civil infrastructure and water resource systems.
Requirements: Normal Entry: At least 3 'A' level passes in Pure Mathematics/Additional Mathematics/Mechanical Mathematics, Physics and either Chemistry, Computer Science or Engineering Drawing. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Relevant National Diploma plus 2 years experience. Relevant Higher National Diploma plus 1-year experience.

Name: Electronic Engineering
Description: Focuses on the design and development of electronic systems and devices.
Requirements: Normal Entry: At least 3 'A' level passes in Pure Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics/ Mechanical Mathematics, Physics and either Chemistry or Computer Science. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: Relevant National Diploma plus 2 years experience. Relevant Higher National Diploma plus 1 year working experience.

Name: Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering
Description: Focuses on optimizing complex processes, systems, or organizations, particularly in manufacturing.
Requirements: Normal Entry: 3 'A' level passes in Mathematics, Pure Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics/ Mechanical Mathematics, Physics and either Chemistry, Computer Science or Engineering Drawing/ Technical Graphics/ Mechanical Technology and Design/ Geometrical and Mechanical Drawing, with O' Level pass in Science/ Chemistry. 5 'O' Level passes including English Language and Mathematics. Special Entry: National Diploma in Mechanical Engineering/ Plant Engineering/ Draughting and Draughting Technology or equivalent and 2 years' relevant experience.
